guest.guest_join_description_2: Please log on within the time limit.​​​
guest.guest_time_expired_description:
The time limit has been exceeded.
Please re-request to connect.​
guest.guest_license_expired: Plan for Guest access is not assigned to the workspace, or all of them are in use already.​
guest.guest_install_mobile_app_description: Press the [Run App] button below to run the VIRNECT Remote App.
guest.guest_install_mobile_app_download_descri: If it is not already installed, please download the APK file.
guest.guest_account_deleted_and_request_accoun:
The assigned guest account has been deleted.
Request an accessible account again.
guest.guest_account_deleted_and_logout:
Account has been deleted.
Logged out.
